Digital One Health Nanopore Workshop

Date: 26-27 February 2024
Location: National Health Laboratory and Diagnostic Services (NHLDS), Entebbe, Uganda

Overview

This workshop will develop expertise in the generation of whole genome sequences using Oxford Nanopore technology. This is part of a series of inititiatives from the Digital One Health Laboratory that aims to bring together AMR stakeholders from various institutions across the One Health spectrum in Uganda.

Programme

Day 1

Time Session Who
09:00 Arrival and morning coffee Bryan Wee
09:30 Pre-workshop briefing Bryan Wee & Vesa Qarkaxhija
09:45 DNA Extraction Part 1 Everyone
12:30 Lunch Break Everyone
13:15 DNA Extraction Part 2 Vesa Qarkaxhija
14:30 Afternoon break Everyone
15:00 Bioinformatics overview (MinKNOW & EPI2ME) Bryan Wee
15:45 Digital One Health showcase (Bodastage) Emmanuel Ssebagala
16:30 END Everyone

Day 2

Time Session Who
09:00 Arrival and morning coffee Everyone
09:30 Sequencing library prep Vesa Qarkaxhija
12:30 Lunch Everyone
13:30 Sequencing Run Vesa Qarkaxhija
15:00 Afternoon tea Everyone
15:30 Bioinformatics overview (MinKNOW & EPI2ME) Bryan Wee
16:30 END Everyone
